column2: WidePoint Corp. engages in the provision of trusted mobility management (TM2) solutions. The company is headquartered in Fairfax, Virginia and currently employs 247 full-time employees. The firm offers secure, cloud-based, enterprise-wide IT-based solutions that enable commercial markets, and federal and state government organizations, to deploy fully compliant IT services in accordance with government-mandated regulations and advanced system requirements. The firm offers telecom management services, which include life cycle management of fixed and mobile assets; mobile security management services, which include life cycle fixed and mobile device access and application control management; identity management services, which include life cycle fixed and mobile, including cloud-based services authentication and information assurance services, and identity services, which include fixed and mobile digital certificates required for secure access to a customer's technology infrastructure.
